title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-9.2 - Registered facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-9.2 - Registered facilities

State Regulations
(a) Facilities of the following types are subject to the registration provision of
section
360.15
of this Title unless
otherwise exempt. In addition to the criteria in Part 360 of this Title, each
facility must comply with the applicable requirements of this Subpart. Facilities located at active mined land reclamation sites or C&D debris
handling and recovery facilities are ineligible for registrations. (1)

Facilities that receive NDM for the
purpose of amending the NDM with portland cement or for the purpose of
dewatering on pads or in enclosed geotextile tubes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-9.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
